Uses of Interface
net.xqhs.flash.core.support.Pylon

  • Packages that use Pylon 
    Package Description
    example.echoAgent
    A simple deployment, testing the deployment of very basic scenarios.
    example.simplePingPong
    The scenario of two agents which ping messages between them (one sends and one replies).
    example.webSocketsDeployment
    Verifies: correct functioning of the websockets support infrastructure, in three different loading contexts (manual deployment, with deployment configuration and simple agents, and with deployment configuration and composite agents).
    net.xqhs.flash.core.composite
    The package contains classes related to the implementation ofCompositeAgent.
    net.xqhs.flash.core.monitoring  
    net.xqhs.flash.core.support
    Core classes dealing with support items, such as communication and mobility.
    net.xqhs.flash.local
    Package that offers support for local communication.
    net.xqhs.flash.webSocket

    • Uses of Pylon in net.xqhs.flash.core.composite

      Fields in net.xqhs.flash.core.composite with type parameters of type Pylon 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      protected Entity.EntityProxy<Pylon> CompositeAgent.supportLink
      This can be used by support implementation-specific shards to contact the support implementation.
      Method parameters in net.xqhs.flash.core.composite with type arguments of type Pylon 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean CompositeAgent.addContext​(Entity.EntityProxy<Pylon> context)
      Context can be added to an agent only when it is not running.
      boolean CompositeAgent.removeContext​(Entity.EntityProxy<Pylon> context)
      Context can be removed from an agent only when it is not running.

    • Uses of Pylon in net.xqhs.flash.local

      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  LocalPylon
      Simple support implementation that allows agents to send messages locally (inside the same JVM) based simply on agent name.
